example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2IdFormat -Resource instance
Resource UseLongIds -------- ---------- instance False
example.description: This example describes the ID format for the specified resource type.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2IdFormat
Resource UseLongIds -------- ---------- reservation False instance False
example.description: This example describes the ID formats for all resource types that support longer IDs.
